# Bless (Spell)
## Overview
[[Enchantment Spells|Enchantment]] ([[Compulsion Spells|compulsion]]) \[[[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Adept Spells|Adept 1]], [[1st Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 1]], [[1st Level Paladin Spells|Paladin 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** 50 ft.

**Area:** The caster and all allies within a 50-ft. burst, centered on the caster

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 249

*Bless* fills your allies with courage. Each ally gains a +1 morale bonus on attack rolls and on saving throws against fear effects. 

*Bless* counters and dispels *[[Bane (Spell)|bane]]*.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added Adept 1 to Level per *PF GameMastery Guide.*
